description: Verify the email scoring process produces correct, complete output.

tests.name: Valid Codebase Produces Score 0-100
tests.prompt: Run email-scoring against a codebase with Resend integration and React Email templates
tests.setup: Provide a Next.js 16 codebase with Resend SDK, React Email templates, and QStash queue
expectations: Output contains a numeric score between 0 and 100

All 10 categories (Transactional Email, Email Templates & Rendering, Notification Queue & Delivery, Email Provider Integration, Deliverability & Reputation, Bounce & Complaint Handling, Email Auth, Rate Limiting & Throttling, Analytics & Tracking, Testing & Preview) have individual scores
Each raw score must be 0-10
tests.pass_criteria: Score is 0-100, all 10 categories present with raw scores 0-10

tests.name: Each Criterion Scored Individually With Weight
tests.prompt: Verify each scoring criterion is weighted correctly and totals are computed properly
tests.setup: Run email-scoring and inspect the scorecard output
expectations: Transactional Email at 15%, Email Templates at 12%, Notification Queue at 12%
Email Provider at 12%, Deliverability at 10%, Bounce Handling at 10%
Email Auth at 8%, Rate Limiting at 8%, Analytics at 7%, Testing at 6%
Weighted score = raw score x weight x 10
Total = sum of all weighted scores
tests.pass_criteria: All weights match specification and total equals sum of weighted scores
fail_indicators: Total does not equal sum of weighted scores

tests.name: Output Includes Scorecard AND Issues List
tests.prompt: Verify output contains both a scorecard table and a prioritized issues list
tests.setup: Run email-scoring and inspect the full output
expectations: Output contains a scorecard table with all 10 categories
Output contains a prioritized issues list with Severity, Category, Issue, Fix
Each issue references specific email service files, templates, or queue handlers
Quick wins section is present
Provider Notes section with Resend version, domain status, queue status, webhook status
tests.pass_criteria: Both scorecard table and issues list present with correct columns and file references

tests.name: Grade Letter Matches Score Range
tests.prompt: Verify the grade letter assigned matches the numeric score range
tests.setup: Run email-scoring and check grade output against score
expectations: Score 90-100 produces A-range grade (A+/A/A-)
Score 80-89 produces B-range grade (B+/B/B-)
Score 73-79 produces C-range grade (C+/C)
Score 60-72 produces D grade
Score 0-59 produces F grade
tests.pass_criteria: Grade letter correctly corresponds to numeric score range
fail_indicators: Grade does not match score range

tests.name: Issues Sorted by Severity
tests.prompt: Verify issues are sorted from most to least severe
tests.setup: Run email-scoring against a codebase with issues at multiple severity levels
expectations: CRITICAL issues (score 0-3 or security risk) appear first
HIGH issues (score 4-5) appear second
MEDIUM issues (score 6-7) appear third
LOW issues (score 8) appear last
tests.pass_criteria: Issues strictly ordered: CRITICAL > HIGH > MEDIUM > LOW
